BJP President Amit Shah to chair a meeting at BJP headquarters in Delhi today to discuss the defeat in recent assembly elections in 5 states & to plan agenda for 2019 General Elections. State Presidents and State in-charges of BJP will be present in the meeting. (ANI)

Congress leader Sachin Pilot arrives at his residence in Delhi; he will meet Congress President Rahul Gandhi later today pic.twitter.com/qOQOd50pMo

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018
BJP Parliamentary party meeting begins in Parliament library building.
BJP's Madhya Pradesh unit chief Rakesh Singh has offered his resignation from the post taking responsibility for the defeat in MadhyaPradesh Assembly Elections. (ANI)

KC Venugopal, All India Congress Committee observer for Rajasthan, arrives at Congress President Rahul Gandhi's residence in Delhi pic.twitter.com/c6NDSTkMhb

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018
BJP President Amit Shah did not accept the resignation of Rakesh Singh from the post of BJP's Madhya Pradesh unit chief and asked him to work hard, reports ANI.
Madhya Pradesh: A meeting of Congress MLAs to be held at 4 pm in Bhopal today (ANI)

details.title: KCR to take oath at 1.33 PM
details.content: TRS president K Chandrasekhar Rao  would be sworn in as the Chief Minister of the State for a second term at a ceremony at Raj Bhavan on Thursday  at 1.33 pm. Rao was unanimously elected leader of the TRS Legislature Party on Wednesday by the newly-elected MLAs.  In all likelihood, Rao  may alone take the oath or with two other colleagues and the ministry can be expanded later.  Rao preferred ‘Dhanista’  star on Thursday for taking oath. Born in Aslesha birth star, Dhanista is Rao’s “Sadhana Tara”, that is why he preferred Thursday,  party sources said adding  the muhurtam is also good.

details.title: KCR to take oath at 1.30 PM
details.content: TRS chief K Chandrasekhar Rao  would be sworn in as the Telangana Chief Minister for a second term on Thursday  at 1.33 pm. Rao was unanimously elected leader of the TRS Legislature Party on Wednesday by the newly-elected MLAs.  In all likelihood, Rao  may alone take the oath or with two other colleagues and the ministry can be expanded later.  Rao preferred ‘Dhanista’  star on Thursday for taking oath. Born in Aslesha birth star, Dhanista is Rao’s “Sadhana Tara”, that is why he preferred Thursday,  party sources said adding  the muhurtam is also good. (File photo | EPS)

All MLAs have unanimously authorised AICC President Rahul Gandhi to select Congress Legislative Party leader (for Chhattisgarh). Whatever decision he takes, the MLAs are ready to accept, says AICCobserver for Chhattisgarh, Mallikarjun Kharge (ANI)

Congress President Rahul Gandhi: We are taking inputs from different people in the party. We are taking inputs from MLAs, from workers. You will see a Chief Minister soon pic.twitter.com/TRTHcvCxCv

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018

The Congress president will first meet the party observers A K Antony for Madhya Pradesh and K C Venugopal for Rajasthan before meeting those in the race. The observers had already held discussions with newly-elected party MLAs in Jaipur and Bhopal Wednesday and would give their inputs to Gandhi on who the legislators want to be as their chief ministers.

Using an internal messaging platform for the party workers, Gandhi sent out to party workers a pre-recorded audio message seeking their feedback for selection of the chief minister in their respective states, reported PTI.

details.title: BJP mounts pressure on Congress, Rahul Gandhi
details.content:
Whn Rahul Gandhi appointed 1984 Sikh Massacre Murdrer Kamal nath as incharge of Punjab assembly election, @capt_amarinder protested till his removal. If RaGa still appoint Sikh Murderer Kamalnath as CM, Captain sahab should protest & Resign from Congress

— Tajinder Pal Singh Bagga (@TajinderBagga) December 13, 2018

Supporters of Congress leader Sachin Pilot have gathered outside All India Congress Committee headquarters in Delhi and are raising slogans demanding selection of Pilot as Rajasthan Chief Minister pic.twitter.com/xr2vJ1OXez

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018

Ashok Gehlot has served as the Chief Minister of Rajasthan twice. He has experience. The public of Rajasthan and the independent MLAs want him to be appointed as the Chief Minister: Rajasthan Independent MLA Rajkumar Gaur (ANI)

The public of Rajasthan wants Ashok Gehlot as the Chief Minister. I also have the same wishes. And I think the high command will also take the same decision: Rajasthan Independent MLA Mahadev Singh Khandela (ANI)

details.title: BJP office bearers meet in Delhi
details.content: After the drubbing in the five state elections, Bharatiya Janata Party office bearers have now gathered for a meeting which is underway in Delhi.
After Priyanka, Sonia Gandhi has arrived at Rahul's residence; decision on Rajasthan, MP CMs soon

details.title: Security tightened in Jaipur ahead of announcement on next CM
details.content: A large number of supporters are present at the civil lines residence of Gehlot, while Sachin Pilot's supporters are present near his house in Jalupura.
Rahul Gtandhi aarrives at his residence, decison on three state CMs soon
Rahul Gandhi arrives at his residence, decison on three state CMs soon
Kamal Nath likely to be next Madhy Pradesh CM.

Sachin Pilot has appealed to party workers to maintain peace and decorum."I have full faith in the leadership, we will welcome whatever Rahul Gandhi ji and Sonia Gandhi ji decide. It is our responsibility to uphold the honour of the party, we are dedicated to the party."
Delay in Rahul's CM's verdict as Congress chief gets trapped in 'young vs old' gaurd.
CM post front runners Kamal Nath, Ashok Gehlot arrive at Rahul Gandhi's residence.
Ashok Gehlot appeals to supporters to stay calm, says such decisions take time.
Congress Legislature Party meeting to now take place at Madhya Pradesh headquarters at 8.30 pm.
Media reports say Gehlot to be next Rajsthan CM; race not over yet for Pilot supporters
Ashok Gehlot called back from Delhi Airport.

details.title: TS Singhdeo, Bhupesh Baghel called
details.content: Senior Congress leaders from Chhattisgarh TS Singhdeo and Bhupesh Baghel have been summoned by the party high command to the national capital for a meeting.

details.title: Jyotiraditya Scindia speaks to media
details.content: "It is not a race, it is not about kursi. We are here to serve the people of Madhya Pradesh. I am leaving for Bhopal and you will get to know the decision today," he said.

details.title: Kamal Nath: Man of the moment for Congress
details.content: His appointment as Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister is a reward for his sharp political maneuvering skills which are credited with the Congress victory in a state where BJP was ruling for three consecutive terms.

details.title: MP to have no Deputy CM
details.content:
Madhya Pradesh: Kamal Nath arrives at Congress party office in Bhopal. pic.twitter.com/12Ntr6OpgZ

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018

details.title: Know your CM
details.content: Kamal Nath has served as the Union Ministry of Commerce and Industry in Manmohan Singh's first term and the Union Minister of Road Transport and Highways from May 2009 to January 2011, among others. He was also the the pro-tem Speaker of the 16th Lok Sabha (elected in 2014).

details.title: Will keep all pre-poll promises: Kamal Nath
details.content:
Madhya Pradesh CM designate Kamal Nath in Bhopal: I'll make absolute efforts to live up to the expectations of the people of Madhya Pradesh. We will fulfil all the promises mentioned in our manifesto. I'll be meeting the Governor tomorrow at 10:30 am. pic.twitter.com/mJh3AeikiW

— ANI (@ANI) December 13, 2018

Senior Congress leader and Rajasthan observer KC Venugopal said that there would be a final decision on who would assume the office of chief minister in Rajasthan on Friday morning
